properties.description: Available printers.
properties.name: printerList

properties.description: Available PPDs.
properties.name: ppdList

properties.description: A list of the available paper sizes.
properties.name: paperSizeList

properties.description: Lists the ink screenings available in the PPD. Note: Valid only when color output is separations or in rip separations.
properties.name: screeningList

properties.description: Returns true if the object specifier resolves to valid objects.
properties.name: isValid

properties.description: The parent of the PrintBookletPrintPreference (a Document).
properties.name: parent

properties.description: A collection of events.
properties.name: events

properties.description: A collection of event listeners.
properties.name: eventListeners

properties.description: The current printer. Can return: Printer enumerator or String.
properties.name: printer

properties.description: The PPD, specified as a PPD name or an enumeration. Can return: PPDValues enumerator or String.
properties.name: ppd

properties.description: The PostScript file to print to. Note: Valid only when the current printer is defined as postscript file.
properties.name: printFile

properties.description: The number of copies to print. Note: Not valid when printer is PostScript File.
properties.name: copies

properties.description: If true, collate printed copies.
properties.name: collating

properties.description: If true, prints pages in reverse order.
properties.name: reverseOrder

properties.description: If true, prints non-printing objects. Note: Valid only when trapping is off.
properties.name: printNonprinting

properties.description: If true, prints blank pages. Note: Valid only when trapping is off.
properties.name: printBlankPages

properties.description: If true, prints visible guides and baseline grids. Note: Valid only when trapping is off.
properties.name: printGuidesGrids

properties.description: The paper size, specified as either a string or an enumeration. For information on paper size names, see paper size list. Can return: PaperSizes enumerator or String.
properties.name: paperSize

properties.description: The paper height. Note: Valid only when paper size is custom or scale mode is scale width height. Can return: PaperSize enumerator or Unit.
properties.name: paperHeight

properties.description: The paper width. Note: Valid only when paper size is custom or scale mode is scale width height. Can return: PaperSize enumerator or Unit.
properties.name: paperWidth

properties.description: The amount of space to offset the page from the left edge of the imageable area.
properties.name: paperOffset

properties.description: The space between document pages on the printing medium.
properties.name: paperGap

properties.description: If true, uses transverse orientation.
properties.name: paperTransverse

properties.description: The orientation of the printed page.
properties.name: printPageOrientation

properties.description: The position of the page on the printing medium. Note: Valid only when tile is false.
properties.name: pagePosition

properties.description: The policy for scaling the page. Note: Valid only when printing from Layout view.
properties.name: scaleMode

properties.description: The amount (as a percentage)  that the page width is scaled during printing. (Range: 0 to 1000) Note: Valid only when scale mode is scale width height.
properties.name: scaleWidth

properties.description: The amount (as a percentage) that the page height is scaled during printing. (Range: 0 to 1000) Note: Valid only when scale mode is scale width height.
properties.name: scaleHeight

properties.description: If true, constrains the proportions of the scaling; uses the most recent value for either scale width or scale height to define both values. Note: Valid only when scale mode is scale width height.
properties.name: scaleProportional

properties.description: The layers to print.
properties.name: printLayers

properties.description: If true, prints all printer marks. If false, prints specified printer marks.
properties.name: allPrinterMarks

properties.description: Prints crop marks that define where the page should be trimmed.
properties.name: cropMarks

properties.description: If true, print bleed marks.
properties.name: bleedMarks

properties.description: If true, prints small targets outside the page area for aligning color separations.
properties.name: registrationMarks

properties.description: If true, add small squares of color representing the CMYK inks and tints of gray in 10% increments.
properties.name: colorBars

properties.description: If true, prints the filename, page number, current date and time, and color separation name.
properties.name: pageInformationMarks

properties.description: The type of printer marks, either an enum value or the name of a custom marks file. Can return: MarkTypes enumerator or String.
properties.name: markType

properties.description: The stroke weight (in points) for printer marks.
properties.name: markLineWeight

properties.description: The distance to offset the page marks from the edge of the page.
properties.name: markOffset

properties.description: If true, uses the bleed area set for the document.
properties.name: useDocumentBleedToPrint

properties.description: The height of the bleed area at the top of the page. Note: Valid only when use document bleed to print is true.
properties.name: bleedTop

properties.description: The height of the bleed area at the bottom of the page. Note: Valid only when use document bleed to print is true.
properties.name: bleedBottom

properties.description: The width of the bleed area at the inside of the page. Note: Valid only when use document bleed to print is true.
properties.name: bleedInside

properties.description: The width of the bleed area at the outside of the page. Note: Valid only when use document bleed to print is true.
properties.name: bleedOutside

properties.description: If true, forces all bleed area settings to be the same, using the most recent bleed measurement setting. If false, allows bleed top, bleed bottom, bleed inside, and bleed outside to have different measurements.
properties.name: bleedChain

properties.description: The color output mode for composites. Note: Not valid when a device-independent PPD is specified.
properties.name: colorOutput

properties.description: If true, prints all text as black unless text has the color None or Paper or a color value that equals white. If false, prints colored text, such as blue hyperlinks, in halftone patterns. Note: Valid only when trapping is off.
properties.name: textAsBlack

properties.description: The type of trapping.
properties.name: trapping

properties.description: The direction in which to flip the printed image.
properties.name: flip

properties.description: If true, prints the document as a negative.
properties.name: negative

properties.description: The ink screening settings for composite gray output in PostScript or PDF format. . Can return: Screeening enumerator or String.
properties.name: screening

properties.description: The screen angle to use when printing composites. (Range: 0 to 360) Note: Valid only for PostScript or PDF files that use custom screening.
properties.name: compositeAngle

properties.description: The screen frequency to use when printing composites. (Range: 1 to 500) Note: Valid only for PostScript or PDF files that use custom screening.
properties.name: compositeFrequency

properties.description: If true, simulates the effects of overprinting spot inks with different neutral density values by converting spot colors to process colors for printing. Note: Not valid when the color output mode is defined to leave color profiles unchanged.
properties.name: simulateOverprint

properties.description: If true, prints the cyan ink. Note: Valid only when trapping is off.
properties.name: printCyan

properties.description: The angle override for cyan ink. (Range: 0 to 360)
properties.name: cyanAngle

properties.description: The frequency override for cyan ink. (Range: 1 to 500)
properties.name: cyanFrequency

properties.description: If true, prints the magenta ink. Note: Valid only when trapping is off.
properties.name: printMagenta

properties.description: The angle override for magenta ink. (Range: 0 to 360)
properties.name: magentaAngle

properties.description: The frequency override for magenta ink. (Range: 1 to 500)
properties.name: magentaFrequency

properties.description: If true, prints the yellow ink. Note: Valid only when trapping is off.
properties.name: printYellow

properties.description: The angle override for yellow ink. (Range: 0 to 360)
properties.name: yellowAngle

properties.description: The frequency override for yellow ink. (Range: 1 to 500)
properties.name: yellowFrequency

properties.description: If true, prints the black ink. Note: Valid only when trapping is off.
properties.name: printBlack

properties.description: The angle override for black ink. (Range: 0 to 360)
properties.name: blackAngle

properties.description: The frequency override for black ink. (Range: 1 to 500)
properties.name: blackFrequency

properties.description: The image data sent to the printer or file.
properties.name: sendImageData

properties.description: Controls how fonts are downloaded to the printer.
properties.name: fontDownloading

properties.description: If true, downloads all fonts listed in the selected PPD. Valid only when font downloading is complete or subset.
properties.name: downloadPPDFonts

properties.description: The PostScript level of the printer.
properties.name: postscriptLevel

properties.description: The format in which to send image data to the printer.
properties.name: dataFormat

properties.description: The source of the color management system. Note: Valid only when use color management is true.
properties.name: sourceSpace

properties.description: The color profile. Can return: Profile enumerator or String.
properties.name: profile

properties.description: The color-rendering dictionary (CRD), specified as a CRD name or an enumeration value. Note: Valid only when use color management is true. Can return: ColorRenderingDictionary enumerator or String.
properties.name: crd

properties.description: The rendering intent. Note: Valid only when use color management is true.
properties.name: intent

properties.description: If true, preserves uncalibrated color numbers.
properties.name: preserveColorNumbers

properties.description: If true, prints graphics that are either OPI comments stored in imported EPS files or linked using OPI comments. For information on linking files using OPI comments, see omit EPS, omit PDF, or omit bitmaps.
properties.name: opiImageReplacement

properties.description: If true, replaces EPS images with OPI links.
properties.name: omitEPS

properties.description: If true, replaces PDF images with OPI links.
properties.name: omitPDF

properties.description: If true, replaces bitmap images with OPI links.
properties.name: omitBitmaps

properties.description: The name of the transparency flattener preset.
properties.name: flattenerPresetName

properties.description: If true, ignores flattener spread overrides.
properties.name: ignoreSpreadOverrides

properties.description: If true, uses bitmap printing.
properties.name: bitmapPrinting

properties.description: The resolution for bitmap printing. (Range: 72 to 1200) Note: Valid when bitmap printing is true.
properties.name: bitmapResolution

properties.description: The current printer preset type. Can return: PrinterPresetTypes enumerator or PrinterPreset.
properties.name: activePrinterPreset

properties.description: A property that allows setting of several properties at the same time.
properties.name: properties

methods.description: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the PrintBookletPrintPreference.
methods.name: toSource

methods.description: Resolves the object specifier, creating an array of object references.
methods.name: getElements

parameters.description: The event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.
parameters.name: handler

parameters.description: The registered event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.
parameters.name: handler
